announcements.title: Emergency: Campus Lockdown
announcements.message: Due to severe weather conditions, the campus is under lockdown. All students must remain in their hostels until further notice. Emergency services are available at 24/7 helpline.

announcements.title: VTOP System Maintenance - Service Disruption
announcements.message: VTOP will be completely unavailable from 2 AM to 6 AM tomorrow for critical system upgrades. Please complete all pending tasks before the maintenance window.

announcements.title: Final Exam Registration Deadline Extended
announcements.message: Due to technical issues, the final exam registration deadline has been extended to September 5th, 2025. All students must register before the new deadline.

announcements.title: Library Extended Hours During Exam Period
announcements.message: The central library will operate with extended hours (6 AM - 12 AM) during the examination period from September 1st to September 30th. Additional study spaces available in Block B.

announcements.title: Campus WiFi Upgrade Scheduled
announcements.message: Campus-wide WiFi infrastructure will be upgraded next weekend. Expect intermittent connectivity issues on Saturday morning. Mobile data reimbursement available for affected students.

announcements.title: New Course Electives for Spring 2026
announcements.message: Exciting new elective courses including AI Ethics, Sustainable Engineering, and Digital Marketing are now available for Spring 2026 semester. Early bird registration starts September 1st.

announcements.title: Student Health Center - Free Health Checkups
announcements.message: The student health center is offering free comprehensive health checkups for all students throughout September. Book your appointment online or visit the center directly.

announcements.title: Student Council Elections - Nominations Open
announcements.message: Nominations are now open for the Student Council elections 2025-26. Showcase your leadership skills and make a difference in the student community. Nomination deadline: September 10th.

announcements.title: Campus Sustainability Week
announcements.message: Join us for Campus Sustainability Week from September 15-21. Participate in tree planting, waste reduction workshops, and green innovation competitions. Prizes worth ₹50,000 to be won!

announcements.title: Mid-Semester Break Schedule
announcements.message: Mid-semester break is scheduled from October 15-22, 2025. Classes will resume on October 23rd. Use this time to rest, catch up on studies, and spend time with family.

announcements.title: Hostel Hot Water System Maintenance
announcements.message: Hot water systems in Hostels A, B, and C will undergo maintenance from September 2-4. Alternative arrangements made in Hostel D common areas. Apologize for the inconvenience.

announcements.title: Orientation Program - Already Ended
announcements.message: This is an example of an expired announcement that should not appear in the app. Orientation program was held from August 1-5.

announcements.title: Inactive Announcement Example
announcements.message: This announcement is marked as inactive and should not appear in the app, even though it hasn't expired yet.

announcements.title: Detailed Academic Calendar Update
announcements.message: Important updates to the academic calendar: 1) Diwali holidays extended by one day, 2) Additional makeup classes scheduled for December, 3) Winter internship program applications now open, 4) Guest lecture series starting in November featuring industry experts from Google, Microsoft, and Amazon, 5) New research opportunities available in collaboration with IIT and IISc.

announcements.title: Special Characters & Symbols Test: 🎓📚✨
announcements.message: This announcement tests special characters, emojis, and symbols: à, é, ñ, ü, €, ₹, ∆, π, ∞. URLs with parameters: example.com/page?param=value&test=123. Email: test@vitap.ac.in. Phone: +91-1234567890.

announcements.title: Future Event - Tech Fest 2026
announcements.message: Save the dates! VIT-AP Tech Fest 2026 will be held from March 15-18, 2026. Start preparing your innovative projects and technical presentations. Registration will open in January 2026.

announcements.title: Multiple Resource Links Available
announcements.message: Access multiple resources for the upcoming semester: Course materials, Exam schedules, Fee payment portal, and Library services. All links are available on the student portal.

announcements.title: Power Outage Alert
announcements.message: Scheduled power outage in Block C from 2-4 PM today.

announcements.title: Weekend Cleanup Drive
announcements.message: Voluntary campus cleanup drive this Saturday and Sunday. Join us to keep our campus beautiful and earn community service hours.

announcements.message: Testing multilingual content support: English, हिंदी (Hindi), தமிழ் (Tamil), తెలుగు (Telugu), Español, Français, Deutsch, 中文, 日本語, العربية. Numbers: ১২৩ (Bengali), ૧૨૩ (Gujarati).
